timeline.bodyText: Is this the tag for 0.12.0? Needs comment linking the two at least. Maybe your just testing?
timeline.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText: This was for testing the RC. Unfortunately the vote passed before I got a chance to evaluate the results here or comment there. This PR needs updated for the new release tag.
replies.author: ndimiduk

replies.bodyText: Yes, this line would not be merged. It's here to provoke a test run; without it, Yetus won't run over any maven modules.
replies.author: ndimiduk

timeline.bodyText: IIRC this was being left alone out of an abundance of caution since it is exposed to our downstream client users.  Since test infra changes need to go to all branches could we break it into a follow on so we can better target specific branches and release note it separately?
timeline.author: busbey
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1593,7 +1593,7 @@
          comes in via hbase-thirdparty hbase-shaded-netty-->
     <netty.hadoop.version>3.10.5.Final</netty.hadoop.version>
     <!-- end HBASE-15925 default hadoop compatibility values -->
-    <audience-annotations.version>0.5.0</audience-annotations.version>
+    <audience-annotations.version>0.12.0</audience-annotations.version>

timeline.message:
HBASE-24200 Upgrade to Yetus 0.12.0

Signed-off-by: Sean Busbey <busbey@apache.org>
Signed-off-by: Duo Zhang <zhangduo@apache.org>
